price: 79. Mpe (Swálih) apesaki bango mokongo (atiki bango), mpe alobi: Eh bato ba ngai! Nasilaki kokomisela bino sango(1) ya Nkolo wa ngai te, mpe napesaki bino toii te. Kasi bolingaka baye bapesaka toii te.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَالَةَ رَبِّي وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُحِبُّونَ ٱلنَّٰصِحِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā ʿanhum waqāla yāqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risālata rabbī wanaṣaḥtu lakum walākin lā tuḥibbūna al-nāṣiḥīna
